turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, Kara. I would like to order pizzas from Mellow Mushroom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course - which store do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's order from the location in Chapel Hill.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sounds good. How many people are you feeding?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am trying to feed a group of about 15 people.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So would you like to order 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's order 4 just to be safe.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay sounds good. What pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's get one Veg Out, one Kosmic Karma, one Holy Shiitake and one Great White.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright - and what size should they be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's get large. And can I specify the crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, what sort of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get these as thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great - so just to make sure thats one Great White, one Kosmic Karma, one Veg Out, and one Holy Shiitake.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I will place the order and the pizzas will be ready for pick up in roughly 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay great, will you pick them up and bring them to the break room?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, absolutely. If you would like, I can send you the receipt to your phone through a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great. Thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, happy to help!
